20 template <class Type, class Accessor = DefaultAccessor<Type> >
21 class TSmartPtr: public TTransPtr<Type>
22 {
23 public:
24  typedef TTransPtr<Type> BaseClass;
25  typedef typename BaseClass::RefCountBase RefCountBase;
26 
27  TSmartPtr();
28  explicit TSmartPtr(Type* pointer);
29  TSmartPtr(const TTransPtr<Type>& pointer);
30  TSmartPtr(const TSmartPtr& pointer);
31 
35  void SetPtr(Type* pointer);
36 
41  template <class SourceType>
42  bool SetCastedOrRemove(SourceType* pointer)
43  {
44  Type* castedPtr = dynamic_cast<Type*>(pointer);
45 
46  SetPtr(castedPtr);
47 
48  if (castedPtr != NULL){
49  return true;
50  }
51  else{
52  if (pointer != NULL){
53  delete pointer;
54  }
55 
56  return false;
57  }
58  }
59 
60  // operators
61  TSmartPtr& operator=(const TTransPtr<Type>& pointer);
62  TSmartPtr& operator=(const TSmartPtr& pointer);
63 
64 protected:
65  class RefCounter: public RefCountBase
66  {
67  public:
68  typedef RefCountBase BaseClass;
69 
70  RefCounter(Type* pointer)
71  : BaseClass(pointer)
72  {
73  m_count = 1;
74  }
75 
76  // reimplemented (RefCountBase)
77  virtual void OnAttached()
78  {
79  Q_ASSERT(BaseClass::IsValid());
80  Q_ASSERT(m_count > 0);
81 
82  ++m_count;
83  }
84 
85  virtual void OnDetached()
86  {
87  Q_ASSERT(BaseClass::IsValid());
88  Q_ASSERT(m_count > 0);
89 
90  if (--m_count <= 0){
91  Accessor::Delete(BaseClass::GetPtr());
92 
93  delete this;
94  }
95  }
96 
97  private:
98  int m_count;
99  };
100 };
101 
102 
103 template <class Type, class Accessor>
104 TSmartPtr<Type, Accessor>::TSmartPtr()
105  :BaseClass()
106 {
107  BaseClass::m_counterPtr = NULL;
108 }
109 
110 
111 template <class Type, class Accessor>
112 TSmartPtr<Type, Accessor>::TSmartPtr(Type* pointer)
113  :BaseClass()
114 {
115  BaseClass::m_counterPtr = new RefCounter(pointer);
116 }
117 
118 
119 template <class Type, class Accessor>
120 TSmartPtr<Type, Accessor>::TSmartPtr(const TTransPtr<Type>& pointer)
121  :BaseClass()
122 {
123  BaseClass::m_counterPtr = GetInternalCounter(pointer);
124 
125  if (BaseClass::m_counterPtr != NULL){
126  BaseClass::m_counterPtr->OnAttached();
127  }
128 }
129 
130 
131 template <class Type, class Accessor>
132 TSmartPtr<Type, Accessor>::TSmartPtr(const TSmartPtr& pointer)
133  :BaseClass()
134 {
135  BaseClass::m_counterPtr = BaseClass::GetInternalCounter(pointer);
136 
137  if (BaseClass::m_counterPtr != NULL){
138  BaseClass::m_counterPtr->OnAttached();
139  }
140 }
141 
142 
143 template <class Type, class Accessor>
144 inline void TSmartPtr<Type, Accessor>::SetPtr(Type* pointer)
145 {
146  BaseClass::Detach();
147 
148  if (pointer != NULL){
149  BaseClass::m_counterPtr = new RefCounter(pointer);
150  }
151  else{
152  BaseClass::m_counterPtr = NULL;
153  }
154 }
155 
156 
157 template <class Type, class Accessor>
158 TSmartPtr<Type, Accessor>& TSmartPtr<Type, Accessor>::operator=(const TTransPtr<Type>& pointer)
159 {
160  RefCountBase* pointerInternalCounter = BaseClass::GetInternalCounter(pointer);
161 
162  if (pointerInternalCounter != BaseClass::m_counterPtr){
163  Q_ASSERT((pointerInternalCounter == NULL) || (BaseClass::m_counterPtr == NULL) || (*pointerInternalCounter != *BaseClass::m_counterPtr)); // two different reference counters cannot shown at the same destination object
164 
165  BaseClass::Detach();
166 
167  BaseClass::m_counterPtr = pointerInternalCounter;
168 
169  if (BaseClass::m_counterPtr != NULL){
170  BaseClass::m_counterPtr->OnAttached();
171  }
172  }
173 
174  return *this;
175 }
176 
177 
178 template <class Type, class Accessor>
179 TSmartPtr<Type, Accessor>& TSmartPtr<Type, Accessor>::operator=(const TSmartPtr& pointer)
180 {
181  RefCountBase* pointerInternalCounter = BaseClass::GetInternalCounter(pointer);
182 
183  if (pointerInternalCounter != BaseClass::m_counterPtr){
184  Q_ASSERT((pointerInternalCounter == NULL) || (BaseClass::m_counterPtr == NULL) || (*pointerInternalCounter != *BaseClass::m_counterPtr)); // two different reference counters cannot shown at the same destination object
185 
186  BaseClass::Detach();
187 
188  BaseClass::m_counterPtr = pointerInternalCounter;
189 
190  if (BaseClass::m_counterPtr != NULL){
191  BaseClass::m_counterPtr->OnAttached();
192  }
193  }
194 
195  return *this;
196 }
